channel.title: 🏢 University of Oslo on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Oslo on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Are nuclear masks all you need for improved out-of-domain generalisation? A closer look at cancer classification in histopathology
item.description: Focusing on nuclear morphology improves out-of-domain generalization in cancer classification from histopathology images by leveraging nuclear segmentation masks during training.
